content: I’m a PhD candidate in Robotics / Aerospace Engineering at the Control and Simulation Group of Delft University of Technology. Currently I’m a visiting student at Robotics and Perception Group (RPG) directed by Prof. Davide Scaramuzza.
summary: I’m a PhD candidate in Robotics / Aerospace Engineering at the Control and Simulation Group of Delft University of Technology. Currently I’m a visiting student at Robotics and Perception Group (RPG) directed by Prof.
title: Sihao Sun

Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature.   Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --
summary: A flight controller for a quadrotor with one rotor complete off, from arbitrary initial orientations and body rates.
title: Upset Recovery Control for Quadrotors Subjected to a Complete Rotor Failure from Large Initial Disturbances

content: Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software.    Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature.   Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --
summary: In this work we obtained an aerodynamic force / moment model for a quadrotor, in both nominal and rotor faliure configurations.
title: Aerodynamic model identification of a quadrotor subjected to rotor failures in the high-speed flight regime

content: Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software.    Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature.   Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --
summary: In this work, we presented a gray-box aerodynamic model for a quadrotor identified from windtunnel high-speed flight data, using a step-wise regression algorithm.
title: Quadrotor gray-box model identification from high-speed flight data

content: Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software.    Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature.   Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --
summary: A sampling based approach for estimating the reachable set of a quadrotor in high-speed regime to predict it's (dynamic) flight envelope.
title: Quadrotor safe flight envelope prediction in the high-speed regime: A Monte-Carlo approach

content: Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software.    Click the Slides button above to demo Academic’s Markdown slides feature.   Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --
summary: We designed a flight controller to achieve high-speed flight of a quadrotor with one rotor completely off. Flight tests in the wind tunnel show robustness of our controller in presence of significant aerodynamic effects.
title: High-speed flight of quadrotor despite loss of single rotor
